CriticalSection

Critical section is a piece of code which must be executed uninterrupted.  In SQF scheduled scripts can potentially be interrupted at any point by another scheduled script or by an event handler, thus we must prevent it.

It is just a wrapper for isNil {};

Example
CRITICAL_SECTION_START
_a = b;
_a = _a + 1;
b = _a;
CRITICAL_SECTION_END

Author: Sparker

Thx Dedmen for this idea!

Macros
CRITICAL_SECTION_START
CRITICAL_SECTION_END
